text: Juan Pablo Guzmán (born January 29, 1981) is a professional tennis player from Argentina. In 2007, Guzmán won the ATP doubles title in Amersfoort with Juan- Pablo Brzezicki where the Argentine duo defeated Robin Haase and Rogier Wassen in straight sets in the final. In singles, he reached the quarterfinals of Umag in 2006 and made the main draw first round of four Grand Slam tournaments between 2002 and 2007. ==External links== * * Category:Argentine male tennis players Category:Tennis players from Buenos Aires Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Juan Pablo Guzmán
